title: American horror story coven - myrtle snow try's to find out who cut Spalding's tongue off
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: I like how Myrtle was so infuriated that she even yelled at Cordelia
LOL @ the look on Fiona's face when she hears about the heart murmur and realizes she killed Madison for nothing.
Has anyone ever noticed that every one of Dennis O'Hare characters that he plays in AHS is always in love with a character played by Jessica Lange and she never loves him back 😂🤣
I love Myrtle outrage. We need more seasons with Frances Conroy
I love this scene so much because Myrtle knows Fiona killed Anna Leigh, but she wasn't able to prove it.
description:
American horror story coven - myrtle snow try's to find out who cut Spalding's tongue off 
3x4 Fearful Pranks Ensue
